name: TankMate
description:
***This game is not finished yet, this is just a prototype***

You play as a tank and you kill enemies to win the game, this currently has Enemies Ai, Repair Shop, Intractable Car Npc. 

Know before Playing:
  • The key is currently The Yellow floating cube box.
  • Intract with Police Car to open the Door
How to play :
  • W & S key for Tank Movement.
  • A & D for Tank Rotation.
  • E for Intractions.
